question: Which Indian state has partnered with SIDBI and launched a Start-up fund for providing employment to the migrant workers?
explanation:
The Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh Yogi Adityanath recently launched “Uttar Pradesh Start-up Fund” by partnering with the Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI).
The state had earlier signed a MoU with SIDBI to speed-up the formation of start-ups in the state. He also handed over the first instalment of Rs 15 crore to SIDBI. The migrant workers will be provided jobs based on their skills and youths of the states will be encouraged to form start-ups.
